title: Walk and Talk: 12 Steps, PVK Inspiration and Why I Don’t Talk to Experts
description: Today I take another walk in the desert to share a little more about what I’m doing with the channel. I talk about my inspiration from AA programs, Paul Van der Klay and why I do t talk with experts. Hope you enjoy! (Sorry I’m not always in frame 🙃)

transcript_parts.text: welcome back to my videos my name is
cassidy i'm the information addict
and i am clearly doing a walk and talk
i'm in the desert again
uh to talk to you all about my channel
and sort of the things that i
want to do with it and sort of take a
step back
and sort of unpack what i've been doing
and why i've been doing it
because i i think i sort of jumped into
it and i did a little bit of my intro
video

conversations and started talking about

think what i've
noticed as i've had some time to reflect

pull it back like okay well

and how do i think
